column4: if i'm resizing a ntfs partition w/ gparted and it doesn't do anything (stuck at the ntfsresize), will it break my hdd if i abort the whole operation? all i got is 1 hard drive w/ 3 partitions …
right now the status bar moves left and right like it's busy, no freeze or anything … but no change since about 5 mins
it can take quite long, just give it some time
